title: Thanjavur RDM Recruitment 2025 - Apply Offline for 305 Village Assistant Posts
description: The Thanjavur Revenue and Disaster Management Department (Thanjavur RDM) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 305 Village Assistant Posts. Interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their 10th pass can apply for the Thanjavur RDM Recruitment 2025. The interested applicants can apply in offline mode.
